wikipedia_page.main: William Hoare was a British gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. He also competed in two diving events at the same Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Gymnastics at the 1908 Summer Olympics – Men's team

response: William Hoare (c. 1707–1792) was an English artist.
William Hoare may also refer to:
*William Hoare (physician) (died 1666)  on List of fellows of the Royal Society G, H, I
